meanings.definition: A group of six people or things performing together.
meanings.sent1: The sextette of friends sang a song at the talent show.
meanings.sent2: The jazz band featured a talented sextette of musicians.
meanings.sent3: The sextette of puppies put on a cute synchronized dance.
meanings.sent4: The sextette of colors in the sunset painted the sky beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The sextette of stars shone brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A musical composition for six voices or instruments.
meanings.sent1: The choir performed a beautiful sextette at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The composer wrote a challenging sextette for the orchestra.
meanings.sent3: The sextette of birds chirped a melodious tune in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The sextette of notes danced together in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The sextette of instruments filled the room with enchanting music.
